author: Mary Morrissey
message: You block your dream when you allow your fear to grow bigger than your faith.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Schweitzer
message: Wherever a man turns he can find someone who needs him.
title: Thought of the day

author: Maya Angelou
message: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
title: Thought of the day
